:show.description: Used to control the ejection and collapse of the selector
:show.description_zh: 用于控制选择器的弹出与收起

showToolbar.description: Whether or not to display the action bar at the top
showToolbar.description_zh: 是否显示顶部的操作栏

maxDate.description_zh: 可选的最大时间（时间戳毫秒）

minDate.description_zh: 可选的最小时间（时间戳毫秒）

minHour.description: Selectable minimum hour, valid only mode=time
minHour.description_zh: 可选的最小小时，仅mode=time有效

maxHour.description: Selectable maximum hour, valid only mode=time
maxHour.description_zh: 可选的最大小时，仅mode=time有效

minMinute.description: Selectable minimum minute, valid only mode=time
minMinute.description_zh: 可选的最小分钟，仅mode=time有效

maxMinute.description: Selectable maximum minutes, valid only mode=time
maxMinute.description_zh: 可选的最大分钟，仅mode=time有效

formatter.description: Input filtering or formatting functions (if you need to be compatible with WeChat Mini Programs, you can only use the setFormatter method)
formatter.description_zh: 输入过滤或格式化函数(如需兼容微信小程序，则只能通过setFormatter方法)

loading.description: Whether the loading status is displayed

itemHeight.description: The height of each individual option in each column
itemHeight.description_zh: 各列中，单个选项的高度

cancelText.description: The text of the cancel button

confirmText.description: Confirm the text of the button

cancelColor.description: The color of the cancel button

confirmColor.description: Confirm the color of the button

visibleItemCount.description: The number of options visible in each column
visibleItemCount.description_zh: 每列中可见选项的数量

closeOnClickOverlay.description: Whether to allow clicking on the mask to close the selector (Note: The closing event needs to be handled by yourself, and will only click on the mask layer to execute the close callback after closeOnClickOverlay is enabled)
closeOnClickOverlay.description_zh: 是否允许点击遮罩关闭选择器（注意：关闭事件需要自行处理，只会在开启closeOnClickOverlay后点击遮罩层执行close回调）

defaultIndex.description: The default index for each column

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the selector is closed

events.name: confirm
events.description: Triggered when the OK button is clicked
events.params: value:返回所选时间戳，mode:当前模式

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the selection value changes
events.params: value:返回所选时间戳，mode:当前模式
